name: MMX Monster cars Demolition
description:
MMX Monster cars Demolition

MMX Monster cars Demolition is a new 2017 Monster truck MMX Monter game where you race against time on brand new monster truck tracks which are specially designed for MMX Monster cars Demolition.

Car with full power,car and trucks also give you a power,so choose your best car that suites your personality and attack on your enemy car with of power.Download this game and have a lot's of fun.

An intimidating Monster Truck, super charged Pick Up Truck that generates great speeds or an invincible Hummer that can climb even.

Monster Truck Racing is the perfect action game that mixes Racing, Shooting and total destruction into one thrilling experience.

Key Features:

=> Multiple Monster truck options to choose from
=> Interactive game play
=> Different types of cars
=> Different levels
=> User Friendly game.
=> Interactive game play
